title: Video: Shinies – SHUGA
content:
Someone has clearly had their grubby little mits all over the new My Bloody Valentine record, and I mean that in the best way possible.

With their first offering of 2013, Manchester quartet Shinies bring out the shoegaze, on what is possibly their closest track to ‘a love song’ so far. Feedback dominated guitars, sleazy yet oh so sincere lyrics accompanied by a cheeky live video, if this doesn’t get them any Valentines Day roses, then nothing will. Check out SHUGA below.

SHUGA from SHINIES on Vimeo.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
